author: yegor
msg: improved work with UDFs and Analysis Toolpack functions, ATP functions are enabled by default and user can create / evaluate them just like built-in functions, both HSSF andf XSSF are supported

author: rmuir
msg: make RandomCodecProvider insensitive to the order of fields being indexed... its a defined mapping now computed up front in ctor

author: rmuir
msg: make sure tests.verbose works in solr, print test params when verbose is set

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3184 Make method getContentId of ModalWindow static
Introduce ModalWindow#CONTENT_ID public constant which is used as default id for the content component

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3184 Make method getContentId of ModalWindow static
Introduce ModalWindow#CONTENT_ID public constant which is used as default id for the content component
